description: Index and search your project’s docs locally to surface precise, copy-ready snippets. Keep context fresh by reindexing changed files on demand. Open files, list indexed docs, and pull summaries to ground your work in authoritative sources.

tools.name: docdex_search
tools.description: Search repository docs and return hits with rel_path, summary, snippet, and doc_id.

limit.description: Max results to return (clamped to server max)

query.description: Concise search query (will be rejected if empty)

project_root.description: Optional repo root; must match the MCP server repo

tools.name: docdex_index
tools.description: Rebuild the index (or ingest specific files) for the current repo root.

paths.description: Optional list of files to ingest; empty => full reindex

project_root.description: Optional repo root; must match the MCP server repo

tools.name: docdex_files
tools.description: List indexed documents (rel_path/doc_id/token_estimate) for the current repo.

offset.description: Number of docs to skip before listing (clamped)

project_root.description: Optional repo root; must match the MCP server repo

tools.name: docdex_open
tools.description: Read a file from the repo (optional line window); rejects paths outside the repo.

project_root.description: Optional repo root; must match the MCP server repo

tools.name: docdex_stats
tools.description: Inspect index metadata: doc count, state dir, size on disk, and last update time.

project_root.description: Optional repo root; must match the MCP server repo
